message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.NE, cs.SY. 

The paper presents a reinforcement learning approach for device placement in distributed neural network training, which involves machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques. The approach is designed to improve the efficiency of distributed computing (cs.DC) and uses graph embeddings to capture relevant information about the structure of the computation graph, which is a common technique in neural networks (cs.NE). Finally, the approach is designed to learn generalizable placement policies that can be applied to any graph, which involves system-level considerations (cs.SY).
